name: radicale
description: Radicale is a self-hosted CalDAV and CardDAV server for contact and calendar syncing across devices. Itâ€™s lightweight and easy to deploy with a minimal configuration.
features: CalDAV support: Sync calendars across devices using the standard CalDAV protocol.
CardDAV support: Share and synchronize contacts between phones, computers, and tablets.
Lightweight deployment: Run on minimal hardware with low memory and CPU requirements.
File-based storage: Store calendars and contacts as simple files without requiring a database.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts for family members or team members with isolated data.
Authentication options: Secure access with HTTP basic auth, LDAP, or custom authentication backends.
Rights management: Control read and write permissions for shared calendars and contact lists.
Git integration: Version control your calendar and contact data by storing files in a Git repository.
Web interface: View and edit calendars and contacts through a basic browser interface.
Cross-platform clients: Compatible with iOS Calendar, Android DAVx5, Thunderbird, and other standard clients.
HTTPS support: Encrypt connections with TLS to protect sensitive calendar and contact information.
Minimal configuration: Get started quickly with sensible defaults and a simple configuration file.
